attributes.action: Alter the standard working week from 5 days (Monday - Friday) to 4 days.
attributes.additional_details:
Some arguments both for and against:

https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/amp.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2017/nov/16/working-four-day-week-hours-labour

https://www.thebalancecareers.com/benefits-and-drawbacks-four-day-workweek-4158304

https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/content.wisestep.com/top-pros-cons-4-day-work-week/amp/
attributes.background:
Years ago a 7 day working week was normal and a 6 or 5 day working week sounded absurd. 

With human development and technology rapidly changing the way we live our lives, the most productive nations in the world work shorter days and trials with shorter weeks have seen productivity improvements.
